thread.section_title: Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Handy for Waterloo Station
thread.title_full: Handy for Waterloo Station - Review of Premier Inn London Waterloo (Westminster Bridge) Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Kyle-Nazard
title: Handy for Waterloo Station
text:
This is exactly what you would expect from Premier Inn. Reasonable sized rooms for London, good facilities, reasonably quiet, despite building work going on over the road. The staff were extremely friendly and helpful and the hotel's location is great for the South Bank and Waterloo area. Good value for London hotels.
Room Tip: Possibly higher rooms might be a bit quieter. I was on 6th floor and had no trouble with noise. See more room tips
